Cmp3\String

Class Format

public abstract class Format

An abstract utility class to handle string formatting.
All methods are statically available.

STATUS: beta

Method Detail

NonBreak

public static String NonBreak(String $strContent, int $intLength=0, bool $blnForce=false)

Replace whitespaces with html entity &nbsp; This is handy to create output which is at least $intLength long in a row without linebreak.

This will not give expected results with HTML content.

Parameters

$strContent -
$intLength -
$blnForce -

FormatAge

public static String FormatAge(integer $intSeconds, String $strMinInterval=selfINTERVAL_SECOND)

Returns the "age" in seconds / minutes / hours / days / weeks / month / years of the number of $intSeconds inputted.
